headline: McGregor Is Trying On A New Look: Nice Guy
abstract: With some selective spin, the mixed-martial arts promotion has been billing its biggest star as past most of his legal troubles since a loss in October 2018.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS — In the week leading into his first fight in more than a year, the U.F.C. star Conor McGregor has exuded a confidence familiar to anyone who has followed his transformation from Ultimate Fighting Championship contender to the fight promotion’s biggest star.
